rukus.text: 74|32|avvāṟu alla! Niccayamāka cantiraṉ mītu cattiyamāka
74|33|celkiṉṟa iraviṉ mītu cattiyamāka
74|34|veḷiccamākum viṭiyaṟkālai mītu cattiyamāka
74|35|niccayamāka atu (narakam) mikap periya kāriyaṅkaḷil oṉṟākum
74|36|atu, maṉitarkaḷukku accamūṭṭi eccarikkai ceykiṟatu
74|37|uṅkaḷil evaṉ (ataṉaḷavil) muntic cellavō allatu (atai viṭṭum) vilakik koḷḷavō virumpukiṟāṉō avaṉ avvāṟu ceyyavum
74|38|ovvoru maṉitaṉum, tāṉ ceyyum ceyalukkē piṇaiyāḷiyāka irukkiṟāṉ
74|39|Āyiṉum, (evarkaḷuṭaiya ceyalēṭu valatu kaiyil koṭukkappaṭṭatō avarkaḷ) valatu pakkattil iruppavarkaḷ
74|40|avarkaḷ corkkattil iruntukoṇṭu, kuṟṟavāḷikaḷai nōkki, ‘‘uṅkaḷai ‘cakar' narakattil pukuttiyatu etu?'' Eṉṟu kēṭpārkaḷ
74|41|avarkaḷ corkkattil iruntukoṇṭu, kuṟṟavāḷikaḷai nōkki, ‘‘uṅkaḷai ‘cakar' narakattil pukuttiyatu etu?'' Eṉṟu kēṭpārkaḷ
74|42|avarkaḷ corkkattil iruntukoṇṭu, kuṟṟavāḷikaḷai nōkki, ‘‘uṅkaḷai ‘cakar' narakattil pukuttiyatu etu?'' Eṉṟu kēṭpārkaḷ
74|43|ataṟkavarkaḷ kūṟuvārkaḷ: ‘‘Nāṅkaḷ toḻavillai
74|44|nāṅkaḷ ēḻaikaḷukku uṇavaḷikkavillai
74|45|vīṇāṉa kāriyaṅkaḷil mūḻkik kiṭantavarkaḷuṭaṉ nāṅkaḷum mūḻkik kiṭantōm
74|46|kūli koṭukkum innāḷaiyum nāṅkaḷ poyyākkiṉōm
74|47|(nāṅkaḷ maraṇittu) itai uṟutiyākak kāṇum varai (ivvāṟē iruntōm). ''(Ivvāṟu ‘cakar' narakavācikaḷ kūṟuvārkaḷ)
74|48|ākavē, (avarkaḷukkākap) parintu pēcum evaruṭaiya cipāricum, aṉṟaiya tiṉam avarkaḷukku oru payaṉumaḷikkātu
74|49|avarkaḷukku eṉṉa nērntatu? Innallupatēcattai (ivvāṟu) puṟakkaṇikkiṉṟaṉar
74|50|veruṇṭōṭum (kāṭṭuk) kaḻutaiyaippōl avarkaḷ irukkiṉṟaṉar
74|51|atuvum, ciṅkattaik kaṇṭu veruṇṭōṭum (kaḻutaiyaip pōl ōṭukiṉṟaṉar)
74|52|(itumaṭṭumā?) Avarkaḷil ovvoruvaṉum, virittu ōtappaṭum oru vētam taṉakkum koṭukkappaṭa vēṇṭum eṉṟu virumpukiṟāṉ
74|53|avvāṟu orukālum naṭakkappōvatillai. Māṟāka ivarkaḷ maṟumaiyaip paṟṟi payappaṭuvatēyillai
74|54|avvāṟu orukālum naṭakkap pōvatillai. Niccayamāka itu oru nallupatēcamē ākum
74|55|(nallupatēcam peṟa) virumpiyavaṉ itai ñāpakattil vaittuk koḷḷavum
74|56|Allāh nāṭiṉāl tavira, avarkaḷ nallupatēcam peṟa muṭiyātu.(Paṭaippiṉaṅkaḷ) añcuvataṟku avaṉē takutiyāṉavaṉ, (paṭaippiṉaṅkaḷai) maṉṉippataṟkum avaṉē takutiyāṉavaṉ
